section.name: Create namespace
section.span: How to create a namespace to gather document types in.

div.p: Creation of a new namespace with prefix name `snp', the abbreviation of 'swatia newspaper'. The new namspace also has a long name 'www.swatia.org/newspaper' (but the screenshot shows 'saraswatia/newspaper', this is due to be updated). This long name is supposed to be unique in the whole world and have the form of an URL.

section.p: While you have the namespaces folder selected as the current folder, select 'create namespace' in the folder action menu. A dialog window appears.

Type a prefix name for the namespace. The prefix name of the namespace will be used as a prefix to all names later defined within the namespace. It it advisable to choose the prefix name of your namespaces short, so that the names within the namespace will not get unfriendly long. You need to choose a different prefix for each of your namespace. As you will use only one or a few namespaces, that will not be a problem.

The prefix name for the namespace will probably not be unique in the whole world. Associate a long, unique name with the namespace, that has the form of a URL. The URL does not have to exist, but if your organization owns a website, it is good practice to use an URL your organization owns, as that guarantees it's uniqueness.
